meta.title: ETF Overlap Calculator | US & HK Stocks
meta.description: Free online ETF overlap analysis tool. Compare holdings overlap between US and HK ETFs to optimize your portfolio and avoid duplication.
meta.keywords: ETF, Overlap, Holdings, Portfolio, US Stocks, HK Stocks, Diversification

error.min_two: Please select at least two ETFs to compare
error.failed: Analysis failed, please check network or try again later

ready_state.title: Ready
ready_state.desc: Select a market and add at least two ETFs on the left, then click 'Analyze' to see their holdings overlap.
ready_state.note: Note: Due to public API limits, only Top 10 holdings are analyzed currently.

result.title: Analysis Result
result.note: * Data from Yahoo Finance, may only include Top 10 holdings.

modal.title: Overlap Details
modal.name: Name
modal.no_common: No common holdings found (based on disclosed Top Holdings)
